Name: Boys Tale
About the game: [About Boys tale] Fairy tale writer Sia gave up writing fairy tales. Sia gets caught up in a mysterious gust of wind and lose his mind... When he woke up, He opened his eyes to a world in a fairy tale. However, there is something strange about the characters in the fairy tale. Captain Hook kissing me?! Help Sia fix the fairy tale world and save the heroes! * There are currently 3 characters, and 3 additional characters will be provided for free. #BL #Yaoi #BxB
